title: StressBall
description: Award-winning AI voice agent that autonomously places phone calls, navigates phone trees, and summarizes conversations.
longDescription: Built an AI-powered voice agent that autonomously calls real businesses, navigates complex phone trees, and delivers structured conversation summaries. Engineered a scalable, serverless backend using Cloudflare Workers and Model Context Protocol, with LiveKit Cloud handling real-time voice streaming and Telnyx enabling automated outbound calling to live phone numbers. Designed an iMessage-based interface using the Poke API, allowing users to text requests and receive AI-generated transcripts stored persistently in Cloudflare KV. Won 'Best MCP' and 'Most Complex' at Cal Hacks 12.0.

title: RCC Growth Analytics Platform
description: Full-stack analytics platform centralizing engagement data for 300+ club members with predictive insights.
longDescription: Built a comprehensive growth analytics platform to centralize club engagement data for 300+ Responsible Computing Club members across events, projects, and ambassadors. Implemented real-time tracking and data visualization using FastAPI for the backend, Supabase for database management and authentication, and Shadcn/ui for modern, accessible UI components. The platform resulted in an 80% increase in accurate growth predictions by providing leadership with actionable insights into member participation patterns.

title: RCC Site
description: Modern web platform built to support Responsible Computing Club outreach, content, and member engagement.
longDescription: Developed the official Responsible Computing Club website featuring a responsive, modern interface to centralize club resources, events, and announcements. Implemented JWT authentication and role-based access control to secure user data, along with RESTful APIs for efficient user management and event tracking. Built with React and Next.js for optimal performance and SEO, utilizing Tailwind CSS for responsive design and Express.js with Supabase for robust backend infrastructure.

title: EPA Compliance Application
description: Full-stack application providing farmers easy access to environmental guidelines and regulatory updates.
longDescription: Created a full-stack EPA compliance application in collaboration with ESA to help farmers navigate environmental regulations. Utilized Redux for predictable state management across the application and GraphQL for efficient, flexible data querying. Implemented MongoDB aggregation pipelines to process and present complex regulatory data in an accessible format, with Winston logging integrated for real-time monitoring of regulatory updates and system health.

title: SCE CI/CD Pipeline
description: Automated deployment infrastructure reducing deployment time by 65% through GitHub Actions.
longDescription: Implemented comprehensive GitHub Actions CI/CD workflows to enforce branch protection and merge gating for pull requests. Streamlined code quality checks by automating linting, testing, and security scanning, preventing unvalidated code from entering production branches. The automated build and deployment pipeline reduced deployment time by 65%, enabling the team to ship features faster while maintaining high code quality standards.

title: SCE Venmo Automation
description: Automated payment verification system streamlining membership dues for 200+ applicants.
longDescription: Designed and implemented a secure automated payment processing system to streamline membership payments for the Software and Computer Engineering Society. Built with Node.js, MongoDB/Mongoose, and Google Apps Script to parse and verify Venmo transactions for 200+ club applicants. Created robust data validation and matching algorithms to automatically associate payments with member profiles, dramatically reducing manual administrative overhead and payment processing errors.

title: SCE Discord Bot
description: Feature-rich Discord bot for server management with integrated music streaming capabilities.
longDescription: Created a comprehensive Discord bot to manage the Software and Computer Engineering Society's server, handling member verification, role assignment, and automated announcements. Developed music streaming features using the ytdl-core Node.js library for high-quality audio playback. Containerized the application with Docker for consistent deployment, utilized Discord.js for seamless Discord API integration, and implemented Prometheus for real-time monitoring and performance metrics.

title: ISBN Search Tool
description: Class material search tool with optimized performance and comprehensive testing.
longDescription: Implemented an ISBN search tool for finding class materials using React.js with a clean, modern interface styled with TailwindCSS. Integrated the OpenLibrary API using JavaScript fetch to retrieve comprehensive book information including titles, authors, publication details, and availability. Wrote extensive unit tests with Mocha and Chai to validate JSON parsing logic and ensure robust error handling. Deployed on the SCE website using Nginx and Docker, serving minified JavaScript files to optimize load times and performance.

title: Card Classifier
description: Deep learning model that classifies playing cards across 53 distinct categories.
longDescription: Built and trained an image classification neural network using PyTorch to recognize playing cards across 53 classes. Implemented custom training and evaluation loops utilizing stochastic gradient descent and cross-entropy loss. Analyzed model performance by visualizing training and validation metrics with Matplotlib to detect overfitting and guide hyperparameter tuning.

title: Mancala Game
description: Object-oriented Mancala game application designed with scalable architecture patterns.
longDescription: Developed a fully functional Mancala game using Java with a clean MVC architecture separating game logic from UI. Applied the Strategy Design Pattern to support multiple board layouts and rule variations, improving extensibility and maintainability. Integrated observer-based updates to efficiently synchronize game state changes with the user interface.

title: AutoMail
description: AI-powered Chrome extension that generates personalized, context-aware email replies.
longDescription: Built a Chrome extension that automatically drafts intelligent email responses using the Gemini API. Implemented DOM parsing and web scraping to extract real-time email content directly from Gmail's interface. Integrated Gmail and Google People APIs to authenticate users, retrieve messages, and personalize responses based on sender context and contact data.
